title: sthANum bhajAmyaham
sahitya:
sthANum bhajAmyaham shankaram shAstam shAshvatam 


anupallavi

  vENu vana nAtham vEdanuta gItam vINA gAna priyam vishvandurIyam


caraNam    kAla bhaya mOcanam kAmadhEnu bhEdanam shUlapANim 
gurum sukhadam kalpatarum nIlakaNThEshvaram nirmalAkAram 
mUla harikEsha para muktidam varam
